body.p: The Software Freedom Day (SFD) is a worldwide celebration of Free Software. This year, it will be on September, 18. The FSFE encourages you to participate to this event in order to inform the worldwide public of the advantages of using Free Software in business, education, public service at home, etc ... If you are interested, see the official website for more information on the general event and you can also register or get an overview of the already registered teams !
